name: Scrambled Egg and Cheese Drop-Biscuit Breakfast Sandwiches
description: Delicious drop biscuits—quick and easy to make—are stuffed with scrambled eggs loaded with melted mozzarella cheese, a touch of feta, and plenty of fresh dill. On the surface, this may seem like a lot of work just for breakfast, but it actually couldn't be easier to prepare.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup finely diced yellow onion (from about 1/2 medium onion)
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium nonstick skillet, heat butter over medium heat until starting to foam. Add onion and cook, stirring, until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add eggs and cook, stirring constantly, until loosely curds form throughout. Add feta and mozzarella and cook, stirring, until mozzarella is melted and eggs are softly scrambled, about 1 minute. Stir in dill and remove from heat. Season lightly with salt and pepper.
Arrange biscuit bottom halves on plates and spoon eggs on top. Close biscuits with top halves and serve immediately.
